claims.claim_text: A method comprising: (a) mixing a composition; (b) setting a process window of 10~20; and (c) completing the process.
The method of claim I, wherein the mixture is processed in the stated window.

description.description_text:
In one embodiment, the method includes blending the composition and holding the process window at 10~20.

The process proceeds by combining the inputs, then finishing the batch without further conditions.
